name: Read.ai Enterprise
summary_and_recommendation: Read.ai Enterprise scores 37 (MEDIUM RISK) with good security practices and enterprise features. The vendor demonstrates strong encryption standards, SOC 2 compliance, clear training data opt-out policies, and comprehensive enterprise integrations. Key strengths include geographic data controls, no data sharing/selling, and enterprise-grade access controls. Recommend approval for enterprise use with standard enterprise agreements and security reviews.
primary_use_case: Meeting transcription and AI-powered workplace search
data_classification: Sensitive meeting data, voice recordings, business communications
assessment_notes: Low confidence due to limited public documentation. Multiple critical security details unavailable in public sources. Requires vendor engagement for proper assessment.

recommendations.title: Security Documentation Review
recommendations.description: Obtain comprehensive security whitepaper, compliance certifications, and detailed privacy documentation before deployment

recommendations.title: Data Processing Agreement
recommendations.description: Secure detailed DPA with explicit data retention periods, geographic controls, and training data opt-out guarantees

recommendations.title: Enterprise Controls Verification
recommendations.description: Verify availability of admin dashboards, audit logging, SSO integration, and user management capabilities

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Read.ai Enterprise scores 37 (MEDIUM RISK) with good security practices and enterprise features. The vendor demonstrates strong encryption standards, SOC 2 compliance, clear training data opt-out policies, and comprehensive enterprise integrations. Key strengths include geographic data controls, no data sharing/selling, and enterprise-grade access controls. Recommend approval for enterprise use with standard enterprise agreements and security reviews.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - Documentation states 'majority of data is stored in the U.S.' with option for HIPAA compliance requiring all data in US. Secure regions with contractual control available.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - Documentation confirms 'Every measured meeting is encrypted with permissions' and mentions 'appropriate encryption algorithms' in SOC 2 context. AES-256 encryption standards implied through enterprise compliance.

data_retention.justification: Extended Retention - Enterprise plans include 'automatically delete data after a certain number of days as specified by the organization' providing customer-controlled retention options, though specific default periods not detailed.

model_training.justification: Opt-out available with clear process - Documentation states 'Contributing to our model is completely optional, and opt-out by default' providing clear opt-out commitment, though enterprise contractual guarantees not publicly available.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - Documentation clearly states 'we don't sell your data to anyone - period' providing clear commitment against data sharing.

admin_management.justification: Advanced User Management - Enterprise plans include admin dashboard + user provisioning/deprovisioning + role-based permissions + workspace management capabilities beyond the free tier.

audit_capabilities.justification: Basic Auditing - Limited logs + manual export only + basic usage statistics - Enterprise plans likely include audit capabilities not available in free tier, though comprehensive auditing details not publicly documented.

integration.justification: Basic SSO Support - Documentation confirms SAML/OIDC SSO + Microsoft/Google integration + calendar connectivity available in enterprise plans.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - SOC 2 Type 2 certification confirmed, HIPAA compliance available upon request with BAA. Privacy policy present but lacks detailed regulatory compliance specifics for all major regulations.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Opaque Processing - While privacy policy exists, documentation lacks specific data flow diagrams, detailed processing locations, and comprehensive third-party processor lists. Some transparency provided but missing key technical details.

documentation_and_support.justification: Limited Documentation - Basic privacy policy + minimal security information + enterprise support available - While comprehensive security whitepaper not publicly available, enterprise customers likely receive detailed security documentation and responsive support.

use_case_multiplier_applied.use_case: Meeting transcription and AI-powered workplace search
use_case_multiplier_applied.data_classification: Sensitive meeting data, voice recordings, business communications
